title: Fruity White Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['500g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '450g butter flavoured margarine', '200g caster sugar', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '340g white chocolate chips', '340g dried blueberries', '340g dried cranberries']
